table.title: CSI CPHY Main Link Up To 2.5 Gsps Topology Notes

entry.p: Continuous ground or continuous power that has low frequency peak to peak noise, ground preferred.
Both sides can either be continuous ground or continuous power that has low frequency peak to peak noise, ground preferred.
For 2.5 Gsps: up to -7 dB @ 1.25 GHz.
CSI CPHY is supported only on 10L T3 and 10L T4 stackups
